entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
